留言內容: This is a cute Hawaiian shirt. I like the colors (I got the Navy blue print). It would look great with shorts, jeans, a skirt, khakis or white pants - it can really go with anything. The size is slightly on the big side - I'm a medium (10) and this fits slightly large but not overly so. I plan to wear it open over a tank top and it will look great. I'm not super thrilled with the material - it has a very slippery feel. It's not see-through, so that's good. You could tie the bottom, like they show in the photos and it would be very cute.
